name: Iceisland
description:
You are stranded on an icy island  gathering resources to buid a paddle and escape it with a boat (it's 3d :) ). 

Movement

WASD to move and click to interact with objects!  1 and 2 to select Items and q to change camera between thirdperson and 1st person.

additional information

Spend a whole month making it  for  my giftee in theSecret Santa Jam.

The game has a bit of a loading time without a loading screen, so please wait for it it will load!

Credits  to my friend for making the present model .
